March 30, 2025 - Bravo Sports is a sporting-goods company based in Santa Fe Springs, CA. Bravo manufactures lawn canopies under the brand names One Industries, QuickShade, ShadeTech, MotoShade, EzUp, etc. The canopies are branded under licenses from Marvel, John Deere, Disney, etc.
